attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make getting a driving licence like joining a golf club, you go on a waiting list.This limits the number of licences at the present number, congestion does not get worse.You wait until some one dies , gives up their licence or is banned before you get on the road. Additional benefits are young drivers take longer to get on the road , banned drivers go to the bottom of the que after their ban is up.This makes your licence a very precious thing, it might improve driving standards.
